history.proof: intros x. destruct x. - left. reflexivity. - right. discriminate. - right. discriminate.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall x : Z, {x = OZ} + {x <> OZ}

Premises:
Inductive Z : Set := OZ : Z | pos : nat -> Z | neg : nat -> Z Arguments pos _%nat_scope Arguments neg _%nat_scope
ZArith_dec.Z_notzerop : forall x : BinNums.Z, {x <> BinNums.Z0} + {x = BinNums.Z0}
ZArith_dec.Z_zerop : forall x : BinNums.Z, {x = BinNums.Z0} + {x <> BinNums.Z0}
BinPos.Pos.eq_dec : forall x y : BinNums.positive, {x = y} + {x <> y}
Byte.byte_eq_dec : forall x y : Byte.byte, {x = y} + {x <> y}
ZArith_dec.Z_noteq_dec : forall x y : BinNums.Z, {x <> y} + {x = y}
BinInt.Z.eq_dec : forall x y : BinNums.Z, {x = y} + {x <> y}
List.count_occ_nil : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A), List.count_occ eq_dec nil x = 0
List.list_eq_dec : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall l l' : list A, {l = l'} + {l <> l'}
Fin.eq_dec : forall x y : Fin.t ?n, {x = y} + {x <> y} where ?n : [ |- nat]
Eqdep_dec.UIP_dec : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (x y : A) (p1 p2 : x = y), p1 = p2
Eqdep_dec.K_dec_type : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (x : A) (P : x = x -> Prop), P eq_refl -> forall p : x = x, P p
Eqdep_dec.K_dec_set : forall A : Set, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (x : A) (P : x = x -> Prop), P eq_refl -> forall p : x = x, P p
List.count_occ_inv_nil : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A), (forall x : A, List.count_occ eq_dec l x = 0) < -> l = nil
List.NoDup_nodup : forall (A : Type) (decA : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A), List.NoDup (List.nodup decA l)
List.nodup_fixed_point : forall (A : Type) (decA : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A), List.NoDup l -> List.nodup decA l = l
List.nodup : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> list A -> list A
List.remove_In : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x : A), ~ List.In x (List.remove eq_dec x l)
List.count_occ_not_In : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x : A), ~ List.In x l < -> List.count_occ eq_dec l x = 0
Zabs.Zabs_dec : forall x : BinNums.Z, {x = BinInt.Z.abs x} + {x = BinInt.Z.opp (BinInt.Z.abs x)}
List.count_occ : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> list A -> A -> nat
List.count_occ_cons_neq : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x y : A), x <> y -> List.count_occ eq_dec (x :: l) y = List.count_occ eq_dec l y
List.remove : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> A -> list A -> list A
List.NoDup_count_occ' : forall (A : Type) (decA : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A), List.NoDup l < -> (forall x : A, List.In x l -> List.count_occ decA l x = 1)
List.nodup_In : forall (A : Type) (decA : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x : A), List.In x (List.nodup decA l) < -> List.In x l
List.count_occ_In : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x : A), List.In x l < -> List.count_occ eq_dec l x > 0
List.NoDup_count_occ : forall (A : Type) (decA : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A), List.NoDup l < -> (forall x : A, List.count_occ decA l x <= 1)
Eqdep_dec.eq_rect_eq_dec : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (p : A) (Q : A -> Type) (x : Q p) (h : p = p), x = eq_rect p Q x p h
List.in_dec : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (a : A) (l : list A), {List.In a l} + {~ List.In a l}
List.count_occ_cons_eq : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x y : A), x = y -> List.count_occ eq_dec (x :: l) y = S (List.count_occ eq_dec l y)
Eqdep_dec.inj_pair2_eq_dec : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (P : A -> Type) (p : A) (x y : P p), existT P p x = existT P p y -> x = y
Eqdep_dec.eq_dep_eq_dec : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (P : A -> Type) (p : A) (x y : P p), EqdepFacts.eq_dep A P p x p y -> x = y
List.nodup_inv : forall (A : Type) (decA : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (k l : list A) (a : A), List.nodup decA k = (a :: l)%list -> ~ List.In a l
ZArith_dec.Z_le_lt_eq_dec : forall x y : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.le x y -> {BinInt.Z.lt x y} + {x = y}
Eqdep_dec.K_dec : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, x = y \/ x <> y) -> forall (x : A) (P : x = x -> Prop), P eq_refl -> forall p : x = x, P p
existT : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Type) (x : A), P x -> {x : A & P x}
exist : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A), P x -> {x : A | P x}
Byte.eqb_false : forall x y : Byte.byte, Byte.eqb x y = false -> x <> y
VectorEq.eq_dec : forall (A : Type) (A_beq : A -> A -> bool), (forall x y : A, A_beq x y = true <-> x = y) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 v2 : VectorDef.t A n), {v1 = v2} + {v1 <> v2}
List.count_occ_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (decA : forall x1 x2 : A, {x1 = x2} + {x1 <> x2}) (decB : forall y1 y2 : B, {y1 = y2} + {y1 <> y2}), (forall x1 x2 : A, f x1 = f x2 -> x1 = x2) -> forall (x : A) (l : list A), List.count_occ decA l x = List.count_occ decB (List.map f l) (f x)
Bool.bool_dec : forall b1 b2 : bool, {b1 = b2} + {b1 <> b2}

```coq
intros x.
destruct x.
- left. reflexivity.
- right. discriminate.
- right. discriminate.
Qed.```

original: intros x. destruct x. - left. reflexivity. - right. discriminate. - right. discriminate.
